info.title: Detect Gender By Name
info.description: Using this API you can easily get the gender based on a first name, for free! There are currently over 5000 names in the databases, both English, European and Asian names are included. The database is constantly updated based on statistical data from various countries. This FREE api allows you to easily detect if a name is female or male!

get.description: Detect the gender based on the first name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name to detect the gender of. If the string consists of multiple words (i.e "John Doe"), only the first name will be used!
